## The Initial Data Loading and Cleaning

```{r}
crime_raw <- read.csv("../data/crime_v2.csv")
```

Last 6 rows are NA in all columns except `prbconv`. `prbconv` has a backtick string character in row 97
```{r}
tail(crime_raw, 10)
```

Remove last 6 rows
```{r}
crime <- crime_raw[1:(nrow(crime_raw)-6),]
```

The presense of the backtick caused `prbconv` to be read in as a factor column. Next we convert it to a numeric column
```{r}
crime$prbconv <- as.numeric(levels(crime$prbconv)[crime$prbconv])
```
